attributes.action: Never again disobey the wishes of the Unites Nations, referring to the war in Iraq, and not be so quick to follow Americas lead in international affairs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Going to war in Iraq was not only illegal in the eyes of most other countries in the world but it was immensely stupid on two counts, allot of other countries saw that the only possible outcome of our actions was the situation that we find ourselves in today. This is why we should have stopped and listened and talked a little bit more first before throwing ourselves into a situation that we knew little about. Many other countries didn’t support military action for a reason, maybe we should have stopped and found out why this was before committing? This leads me to our biggest crime, it being that we, by our actions, completely undermined the UN, how can we use the UN to make this world a safer and better place when we ourselves ignore its authority? It should be our aim to unify the UN, not to make a joke of it.
